description: Retrospective application for the erection of a hip to gable roof extension, three rear dormer roof extensions with additional windows, amendment to existing flat layout to comply with space standard, proposed screen to existing external stair to avoid overlooking.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the design and access statement, and shall be carried out in accordance with the agreed details and retained as such permanently thereafter.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Reason:  In order to safeguard the visual amenity of the area and building in particular and to satisfy the requirements of policies CC1 Context and character and SC7 Residential extensions and alterations of the adopted Local Plan) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The cycle parking shall be provided in accordance with the hereby approved plans and shall be made available prior to occupation of the flats, and shall be permanently available for the occupants of the residential units without obstruction.

Condition : 4 - The landscaping and boundary details shall be implemented in accordance with the hereby approved plans and design and access statement, and shall be implemented prior to the occupation of the flats and in accordance with the agreed details and retained as such in perpetuity.

Condition : 5 - The bin stores shall be provided in accordance with the hereby approved plans, and shall be made available prior to occupation of the flats, and shall be permanently available for the occupants of the residential units without obstruction. No waste and recycling bins shall be left outside the building at any time other than for collection.

Condition : 6 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.
Condition : 7 - The windows formed in the flank elevations shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall be retained as such in perpetuity.
